description: This table contains trace information about a specimen's billing actions related to triggering a charge.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order associated with the charge trace on the specimen.

columns.name: TRACE_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the charge on the specimen was triggered.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user whose action triggered the charge on the specimen.

columns.name: CHG_TRG_TRC_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The charge trigger trace action category ID for the specimen.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Trigger Charge


Send Void Message (All Charges)


Send Void Message (Addl Billing)


Update Order


Update Specimen


Create Charge


Drop Charge Into Router


Retrieve Primary PX


Evaluate Trigger Context


Evaluate Trigger Rule


Evaluate Triggered Charges


Retrieve Additional Charge Px


Void Charge


Update Charge


Request Charge Trigger


Process Charge Trigger

columns.name: TRACE_COMMENT
columns.description: The charge trigger trace comment entered by the system about the trigger action.

columns.name: TEST_LINE
columns.description: The test line that the charge on the specimen is associated with.

columns.name: RECORD_INFO
columns.description: The trace information for a charge triggered on the specimen.
